Fall_River.Preserved Gardner House:
The Preserved Gardner House is a historic house located at 90 Milford Road in Swansea, Massachusetts.


== Description and history ==
This 2-1/2 story, wood-framed house was built in about 1820, and is a good local example of a Federal style farmhouse. Its porches were added in the late 19th century, when the house was converted to a summer residence when Swansea became a fashionable summer resort area.
